Miscellaneous Highlights: The Portland Trail Blazers have the sixth-worst record in the NBA and have suffered 10 defeats by 20 or more points, including home losses by 45 to Memphis and 42 to Utah.
Others: Anfernee Simons is having his worst season since becoming a regular starter four seasons ago, averaging 17.7 points, down from a career-high 22.6 last season.
Simons' shooting percentages from 3-point range (.335) and the field (.415) are both second-worst of his career.
